step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with fists clenched and arms drawn in. Ensure you're inhaling and tightening your muscles as instructed.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles during this outward movement.
Continue to focus on opening your fingers wide and relaxing your muscles as you exhale. Keep the outward arm movement smooth.
Great work extending your arms to shoulder height. Ensure you're fully exhaling and relaxing your muscles during this phase.
Excellent execution of the full movement. You're opening your fingers and extending your arms effectively while exhaling and relaxing.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open and arms extended as you exhale and relax. This helps promote lymph drainage effectively.
